body_html:
This seems like there might be some networking issues on the device you're running the build on. I see many error messages of the form "Timed out connecting to " in the output you've provided above.

Perhaps your internet connection is a bit flaky at this time?

body:
This seems like there might be some networking issues on the device you're running the build on. I see many error messages of the form "Timed out connecting to <some URL>" in the output you've provided above.

Perhaps your internet connection is a bit flaky at this time?
